content: Liberal’s “climate change”, is the most audacious scientific fraud, in which a non-existing 390 ppm amount of atmospheric CO2 would be warming up entire globe on 2 degrees Celsius. It is 1 000 000 : 390 = 2564 parts of atmosphere per every single part of CO2! And — melting glaciers, in addition! CO2 must have its temperature in range of the temperature on surface of the Sun, to do such a job! With help of the “fake news” propaganda media, leftists are fooling entire Universe on matter of the table of multiplication, simply! To make matter worse, fraudsters are sabotaging a real source of geothermal heat. Recently, NBC News exposed this real source of “climate change” — in California flood disaster. Volcano Kilauea, in Hawaii, is flowing into Pacific Ocean 400 000 tons of hot volcanic lava daily, unstoppable for over 33 years! Nevertheless, some liberal zombie is blaming California flood disaster on “manmade” geothermal power plant, which has a minuscule portion of huge geothermal power of volcano Kilauea. Ones might take a look at source on youtube link, around 4:20 minutes, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=COVaqgetJmE Now, we have a fraudulent entity, making personal prosperity by sabotaging national security! And mocking highest government official — as this article says!
